casebody.data:
SHIPYARD ASSOCIATES, L.P., Plaintiff,
v.
HOBOKEN PLANNING BOARD, Defendant. City of Hoboken, Plaintiff,
v.
Shipyard Associates, L.P., Defendant. Shipyard Associates, L.P., PLaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Hudson County Planning Board and Hudson County Board of Chosen Freeholders, Defendants. (Hudson Tea Buildings Condominium Association, Inc.-Petitioner) C-563 September Term 2017
079967 Supreme Court of New Jersey. February 2, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-4504/4637/4763-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
